snippet: In announcing a move that will affect about 15,000 employees, United Parcel Service cited costs associated with the federal health care law.
abstract: United Parcel Service tells its white-collar employees that it will stop providing health care coverage to their spouses who can obtain coverage through their own employers; cites costs associated with federal health care law for move, which will affect about 15,000 employees.
lead_paragraph: In announcing a move that will affect about 15,000 employees, United Parcel Service cited costs associated with the federal health care law.

headline.main: U.P.S. to End Health Benefits for Spouses of Some Workers
headline.print_headline: U.P.S. to Cut Insurance For Spouses Of Some

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
